scripts.generate-client: algokit generate client dist/PartnerFactory.arc32.json --language typescript --output client/PartnerFactory.client.ts && algokit generate client dist/Partner.arc32.json --language typescript --output client/Partner.client.ts
scripts.generate-client:bugged: algokit generate client dist/BuggedPartnerFactory.arc32.json --language typescript --output client/BuggedPartnerFactory.client.ts && algokit generate client dist/BuggedPartner.arc32.json --language typescript --output client/BuggedPartner.client.ts
scripts.build: bun run compile && bun run generate-client
scripts.build:bugged: bun run compile:bugged && bun run generate-client:bugged
